bug.author: LMescheder
bug.summary: len of iterator incorrect for dynamic batching
bug.description:
The method of (defined <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/text/blob/master/torchtext/data/iterator.py#L157>here</denchmark-link> ) returns a wrong result for dynamic batching (i.e. if <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/text/blob/master/torchtext/data/iterator.py#L50>batch_size_fn</denchmark-link> is not None). For example if we set batch_size_fn to <denchmark-code>lambda x, n, b: b + len(x.text) </denchmark-code>
there might be more or fewer batches in the dataset than the __len__ outputs.
